item.title: Mottos
item.description: 2024 Be cautious in both speech and action. First things first. Avoid living a lefe of suffering. Opportunity favors the prepared mind. Focus on your own matters, respect others’ choices, and live in harmony with nature. 人生是一场修行。 积极面对困境、挑战和内心的挣扎，以强健的体魄追求外在的成功；坚持学习新事物，不断提升自己的心智、情感和精神层面。 Think first, act later. Speak less of what’s unnecessary, do less of what’s pointless, and waste less energy on what’s unimportant. In times of peace, prepare for challenges. Hope for the best, but always plan for the unexpected.
